title: How to Browse My Origami Database
body: Here on our site, you could browse our database of Origami tutorials several ways!

text.title: Origami Tutorials from A-Z
body: Click here to have our tutorials sorted alphabetically.

text.title: Origami Tutorials by Designer
body: Click here to have the tutorials sorted by Designer Name.

text.title: 100 Exotic Airplanes Project
body: Click here to see only my Exotic Paper Airplane Series sorted chronologically.

text.title: My own designes
body: Click here to see a list of my origami designes.

title: Checkout My Latest Origami Tutorials
body: These origami tutorials are from my YouTube Channel Heap Art. Check it out when you have a chance

title: Random Origami of the Day
body: Pratice origami by folding whatever is in the video below. It changes Everyday!

title: Random Paper Airplane of the Day
body: This is today's Exotic Paper Airplane. It is randomly selected from our library. It's something different everyday. Have you seen this one before?
You could watch the up to date collection here on our official "100 Exotic Paper Airplanes Challenge" page.

text.title: YouTube Channel - Heap Art
body: All Tutorials on my web site are hosted on YouTube. Join me on YouTube to have my origami tutorials delivered to you.
